description: Major UX Redesign: Hero Section with PROGRESSIA Branding + Complete Panel Reorganization

changes.title: Added PROGRESSIA Hero Section
changes.description: Added professional brand header with gradient blue background, PROGRESSIA logo, Citizen-Reports title, and Jantetelco location badge

changes.title: Reorganized Panel Layout
changes.description: Changed order to: Branding → Modo Vista → Resumen → Clear/Select All Button → Prioridades → Categorías

changes.title: Elevated Clear/Select Button
changes.description: Moved Limpiar/Todos button to prominent position after summary, styled with larger font, uppercase text, and hover effects

changes.title: Enhanced Labels
changes.description: Added uppercase styling and increased letter-spacing to section headers for better readability

changes.title: Improved Content Scrolling
changes.description: Separated scrollable content area with flexbox gap for better spacing between sections

design_rationale.brand_first: Hero section immediately establishes application identity and context (Jantetelco, PROGRESSIA)
design_rationale.progressive_disclosure: Users see context → current mode → summary → global controls → detailed filters (F-pattern)
design_rationale.accessibility: Large text, clear hierarchy, consistent spacing following Material Design 3 principles
design_rationale.civic_tech_context: Professional appearance builds citizen trust in government transparency tool

hero_section.layout: Flex with brand left, emoji right

validation.responsive_design: ✅ YES - Mobile and desktop layouts preserved
validation.accessibility: ✅ YES - Semantic HTML, sufficient contrast, readable typography
validation.functionality_preserved: ✅ YES - All filtering and data logic unchanged
validation.user_hierarchy: ✅ IMPROVED - Clear visual hierarchy following F-pattern

ux_principles_applied: F-pattern Reading: Top horizontal → Secondary horizontal → Left vertical scan
Gestalt Proximity: Grouped related controls together
Visual Hierarchy: Size, color, and position establish importance
Cognitive Load: Simple info first, detailed options below
Civic Tech Trust: Professional branding builds user confidence

rollback_info.rollback_strategy: Restore header structure with original section ordering
